txt.en: Ned Diggins has gone and eaten the pie crust you brought him as a replacement for the earlier crust he devoured, and now he is in a real pickle.

'I seem to have eaten the pie crust you brought me, [placeholder].\n\n'Do you think you could bring me another one? I'm sorry to be a bother, but I just can't help myself! I have another half-dozen eggs to give you if you'll help me! How can you refuse that?'

Ned Diggins is in Michel Delving.\n\nNed Diggins is waiting for you to return with a pie crust he can use to replace the one he ate that was to replace the one he ate, before his wife discovers it missing.
'I'm not even going to look at this one, [placeholder]!\n\n'Take these coins, eggs, and other small items, and my deepest apologies for troubling you over this! Twice!'

Ned Diggins is in Michel Delving.\n\nNed Diggins is waiting for you to return with a pie crust he can use to replace the one he ate that was to replace the one he ate, before his wife discovers it missing.
'Thanks for helping me out with that...with those...issues earlier.'
'I need a pie crust, friend! Yes, another one. I know!'
'I love pie crust! I can't help it!'
'I love pie crust! I can't help it!'
Bring pie crust to Ned Diggins
